title: Emerald & Polki Diamond Jadau Haaram - The "Haritha Lakshmi"
materials: 22K Gold base with Hyderabadi Polish. High-quality Polki diamonds (uncut diamonds) with a clarity grade of SI1-SI2. Natural Emeralds with a vibrant green hue. Freshwater Pearls.
features: Intricate Jadau setting showcasing the artistry of Hyderabad's finest craftsmen. The necklace features a three-layered design with delicate floral and paisley motifs crafted with Polki diamonds. Emerald accents are strategically placed to draw the eye and add a touch of regal elegance. Finished with cascading freshwater pearl drops. The central pendant is a traditional mandala design symbolizing prosperity and wholeness.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and other significant cultural events. Also suitable for high-end gala events and celebrations.
description: This Haaram represents the pinnacle of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The use of Polki diamonds gives it a unique, antique charm, while the Emeralds add a touch of modern sophistication. The handcrafted Jadau setting ensures that each stone is perfectly placed to maximize brilliance. A true heirloom piece, designed to be cherished for generations. Symbolizes prosperity, beauty, and tradition, making it a significant investment and a stunning addition to any jewelry collection. The flexible design allows for comfortable wear despite its opulent appearance.
